pageProduct.name: Palmers Coconut Oil Formula Zero Break Pre Shampoo 60g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer’s® Coconut Oil Formula® Zero Break Pre-Shampoo intensive treatment helps moisturise hair and seals damaged ends to prevent breakage. With Macadamia, Avocado, Argan Oils and Mango Butter.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

Deeply penetrates to fortify the hair shaft, protecting from heat damage, manipulation, chemicals and overly drying cleansers.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Gardenia Tahitensis Flower Extract, Emblica Officinalis Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ethylhexyglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Citric Acid, Fragrance (Parfum), Isopropyl Alcohol, Tetrasodium EDTA, Sodium Acetate, Cellulose, Ceramide NP, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Sucrose Stearate, Coumarin.

Directions

Apply generously onto DRY hair before washing, concentrating on ends and dry areas. Allow to penetrate for 10 minutes, using heat if desired. Rinse, then follow with shampoo and conditioner. Use 1-2 times a week, or every other wash day.
